alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 4:18PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Caswell, southeastern Pittsylvania, and southwestern Halifax Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Providence to near Prospect Hill. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yanceyville... Prospect Hill... Turbeville... Milton... Blanch... Leasburg... and Hamer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central North Carolina...and central and south central Virginia.
